description: Non-material minor amendment to condition 26 (car parking spaces within the north-eastern building) of planning permission P102364 dated 23 March 2012.
decision_conditions:
The agreed amended wording for condition 26 is:

CONDITION: The car parking spaces (including disabled parking spaces) within the north-eastern building shown on drawings 1593-5-P-000-0011 and 1593-5-P-000-0012 hereby approved shall be laid out in accordance with that plan and also appropriately line-marked either prior to the occupation of Tower E of the north-eastern building or by 31/12/2014, whichever is earlier.  The disabled parking spaces shall be kept available for the parking of vehicles for disabled persons at all times.

REASON: In the interest of ensuring the provision of appropriate disabled parking spaces, and to accord with policies 6.3 and 6.13 of the London Plan 2011 and policies DM8.2 and DM8.5 of the Islington Development Management Policies 2013.
